reporting.reporttable.TableQuery:
DECLARE @GlobalStatus bit; SET @GlobalStatus = {%Settings.CMSStoreUseGlobalOrderStatus?1:0|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)9bd244453202a9d0d1237512a26b994f97ded3eac1eab78f82a5b9a0c6efeb23%};
SELECT StatusDisplayName AS '{$com.report.orderstatus$}', COUNT(OrderID) AS '{$ecommerce.report_numberoforders$}' FROM COM_OrderStatus LEFT JOIN COM_Order ON OrderStatusID = StatusID AND OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID AND (OrderDate >= @FromDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (OrderDate <= DATEADD(day,1,@ToDate) OR @ToDate IS NULL) WHERE (StatusEnabled = 1 OR StatusID IN (SELECT OrderStatusID FROM COM_Order WHERE OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID)) AND ((StatusSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID AND @GlobalStatus = 0) OR (StatusSiteID IS NULL AND @GlobalStatus = 1)) GROUP BY StatusDisplayName, StatusOrder ORDER BY StatusOrder
